name: Tic-Tac-TicTac
description:
A game of Tic-Tac-Toe like you've never seen before!  In this 3-player version, the third player must place their Exo™ symbol in a strategic fashion to create a line containing their piece, a naught, and a cross. 

Be careful though - the Exo™ piece can be used by the other two players to form their line of three, since it counts as both a naught AND a cross.
